name: The snowmen before Christmas
description:
Welcome to our game...

Story:

Snowmen are gathering to play around and have fun before starting to work in the winter for the kids. One night, a group of snowmen start playing with magic and by mistake, they summon the snowman overlord himself.

Game Play: 

Survive against the snowmen.

Theme:

What Snowmen Do At Night?

Controls:

  • WASD for movement.
  • Mouse X, Y for turning and looking up.
  • Shift for sprint.
  • Space bar for jump.
  • Left mouse button to throw snow ball.
  • Right mouse button to zoom.
  • V for melee attack
  • E for  interaction.
  • Q for special attack.
  • TAB to force next wave when you have 1 stuck enemy.
  • ECS to pause the game.

Please enjoy and have fun :)
